content: The amount of time it takes to determine if someone is not interested in rebuilding a friendship can vary depending on the individuals and circumstances involved. However, as a general rule of thumb, if you have consistently made efforts to communicate with Jess and rebuild the friendship for several months and have not seen any progress or positive changes, it may be an indication that she is not interested in rebuilding the friendship at this time. Again, this is just a general guideline, and the length of time may be shorter or longer depending on the situation.
